replies.body:
Hey there, and welcome to The Avicus Network! Here's a couple things you should know if you don't already :)

Avicus currently has three different donator ranks. Gold, Emerald, and Diamond. Make sure you review the rules, which can be found here http://avicus.net/rules. Currently Avicus has Nebula, Nexus, CTH, Avicade, Walls and Elimination for minigames. For a full list of current Avicus staff members, visit this link http://avicus.net/staff

If you wish to create a map for the server make sure that you have it in a void world and that it is unique! You can upload your completed map to the forums under the "Map Releases" section with a download to the map, pictures of the map and a YAML. You can visit the Avicus YAML docs to learn all about how to create YAML's!
(http://docs.avicus.net/)

If you have further questions, don't hesitate to ask anyone, and I hope you have a wonderful time on the server and the forums :)
replies.body_tagged:
